website_summaries.verdict: A convertible car seat with an emphasis on comfort as well as safety, appropriate for children ranging from 5 to 50 pounds.
pros: The fabric of is machine washable and dryer safe to allow for easy cleaning
In the rear-facing position, it is suitable for children 5 to 40 pounds, while the forward-facing position is for children 22 to 50 pounds
cons: This car seat might be a difficult fit in some smaller vehicles

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Cozy!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly very impressed. I nannied for families that all bought very expensive high end car seats. So now trying to buy one for my first daughter, i was planning on paying a good $300! So glad i found this. Very sturdy. Very comfy!! Great padding-- something I was looking for. And very roomy while still slim. Very lightweight which is important for me for the times my husband isnt around to carry it
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Vallem

customer_reviews.title: Solid investment
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shortly after my son was born. My son is about to turn 4 and it’s still going strong. As you people with kids know, and you just having kids will find out. These things take a beating! The cover is relatively easy to remove and wash, very easy to pull in and out of my truck. This is a solid investment for anyone looking to buy a car seat. Gone are the days of buying 4 car seats before your kid turns 5
customer_reviews.author: Eric Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Safety concerns
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this car seat 7 months ago and I’m already having to purchase a different one. Thought it was a great purchase at first, but now we’re having major safety concerns with the straps not staying in place after our child is buckled in. Every time I tighten the straps, then pull to check the tension, the straps come completely loose again. This seat provided great comfort, easy to install, and lightweight, but just not worth the risk of my child’s safety.
customer_reviews.author: Gray05

customer_reviews.title: it is very light and easy to carry through the airport and easy to install ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for use during travel. On the plus side, it is very light and easy to carry through the airport and easy to install on a plane. However the negatives outweigh this. 1. We have never been able to firmly secure this rear facing and had to use it forward facing in a variety of vehicles. 2. The straps do not have much slack and I'm not sure it will fit my 2 year old for very long. 3. The straps are very difficult to tighten and loosen.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Basic, but good "second car" carseat
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, easy to install..but its a second car (not our main) carseat. Personally feels a bit thin in the way of safety compared to our graco convertible extend to fit. .. I think its a great, inexpensive extra, and the baby enjoys it. So no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: køi

customer_reviews.title: This is the best carseat we've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best carseat we've ever owned! It fits well forward and backward in my SUV and I know it has to be comfortable because my LO can't stay awake in it! It's easy to install and keep clean. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Stanfill

customer_reviews.title: Straps do not tighten
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is not what I expected. I’ve tried and tried and either the entire thing turns over or the straps do not properly tighten. I will call tomorrow after seeing reviews saying how this is “easily” installed. I don’t find anything easy about this seat. I will say it is very lightweight and the padding is good, but I’d much rather pay extra money for one that is secure. I do not feel safe driving with my grandbaby in this seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heck yes
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t installed it yet but oh my goodness this is the most cushion I’ve ever felt in a car seat before! Very comfortable for our daughter and very nice/neutral
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Lovejoy

customer_reviews.title: It's 10 $ less than when we bought it for my son but I highly recommend. Easy to clean and wash
customer_reviews.text: Light weight we've had it for a year now my son is almost two and still hasn't out grown it. We switched him at nine months but I'm shooting for seven or six with my daughter whose five months we got her the purple one. It's 10 $ less than when we bought it for my son but I highly recommend. Easy to clean and wash. My son threw up all over it and we only had to wash it once but I washed it twice any ways. It never fades material is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Krisher

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the seat and it seems durable but the look is deceiving...it looks plush but the padding is thin...I just wish there was more softer padding, but the safety rating says a lot! That's the important part.
customer_reviews.author: Donald N. Scholfield

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for the price. Fabric seems slightly cheap and was wrinkled in places when it arrived. Also packaging isn't great. Just shoved in a box. No packing material to protect the car seat.
customer_reviews.author: M. Vineyard

customer_reviews.title: Great quality convertible seat at an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality seat! I am currently using it as a rear facing seat for my 20 month old daughter, but I look forward to using it front facing. It is not too hard to install, just read the instructions carefully and there are tutorial videos to help as well.
customer_reviews.author: WALLACE

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat my son seems to like it as well ..packaging was all ripped but I'm sure that just had to do with the mailing carrier other than that everything else was good 😁👍
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: he's 8 months wearing 2T and it looks like this will be big enough to grow with him
customer_reviews.text: No complaints..matches my truck..looks comfy..my sons chillin..he's 8 months wearing 2T and it looks like this will be big enough to grow with him.
customer_reviews.author: neil

customer_reviews.title: Not so good not bad
customer_reviews.text: For 18 months boy it is portable and safe. The thing we dont like is this car seat keeps the child in sleep position
customer_reviews.author: Sacid

customer_reviews.title: Happy Mother!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this seat as a secondary one for my mom to use while I'm at work really happy with the product and best of all the price as I have one on my car I was looking for something not too expensive but that was safe for my son. I am happy with the purchase I made.
customer_reviews.author: Alma Aleman

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and attractive. Not as comfortable as I thought it would be from the pictures. My other son has a Graco similar to this one and it's way more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Nice seat
customer_reviews.text: Very sliim and light weight does well rear facing cup holders are deep so things don't fall out super easy this this is a great convertible seat
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Graham

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. I bought for grand daughter so I need light weight for me to lift. it is light weight.
customer_reviews.author: kw

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this seat! Our son fell asleep the first time he used it. It's well cushioned!
customer_reviews.author: ajduvall

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: This seat looks great, is comfy, and is all around pretty awesome for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: It's extremely lightweight and easy to maneuver on an airplane
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is a dream for traveling. It's extremely lightweight and easy to maneuver on an airplane.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Molina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome car seat.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my two year old son. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: MaKyla Constable

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe and cheaply made!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t ever buy this cheap piece of garbage. I would never trust this seat to save or protect my sons life. There’s no styrofoam on it for added protection, the installation is a NIGHTMARE and even when installed correctly and checked by professionals it slid around EVERYWHERE and tilted side to side with ease. It wasn’t even sent with any kind of shipping precautions so it was knocked around through the entire shipping process and broke through the box too. I’m sending it back and will never order from this company again. If i could have given zero or negative stars i would have.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Love this car seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat, very roomy for a growing child. Easy to clean and very soft, my boy loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Gomez-Romero

customer_reviews.title: It worked out for my grandchildren perfectly. Though the ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked out for my grandchildren perfectly. Though the cup holders need to be a tad larger for sippy cups. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Hooks

customer_reviews.title: Missing infant insert
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with infant insert (inner cushion) as shown in photos
customer_reviews.author: Brenna B.

customer_reviews.title: Size Matters
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. A bit big for our car, but that's our mistake, still useable though. Will definitely refer others! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Crysta

customer_reviews.title: Super light Cupholders are at the perfect arms-length The black/gray ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Super light Cupholders are at the perfect arms-length The black/gray combo hides stains nicely Cons: Not super comfy for the kiddo No strap covers, so digs into his skin [I bought separate ones] Doesn't seem to install as safely as our Peg Perego...we just wedge this one between the front seat and the backseat.
customer_reviews.author: Kat S.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat. Great price. Baby is happy and has plenty of room to grow in it. And baby loooves the cup holders
customer_reviews.author: Alli Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight And Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I'm grandma so wanted to make sure my grandson's seat was lightweight and easy for me to move around and fasten. I love the design of this one and how it leans back just a little. The two cup holders are perfectly positioned for sippy cups, binkys and snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Drea C.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty much what I expected. The delivery was fast and the product was great.
customer_reviews.author: desiree

customer_reviews.title: Love it. But I wish the stap between their ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. But I wish the stap between their legs was adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Hate this seat
customer_reviews.text: Straps are difficult to tighten. When they are raised as high as they will go it doesn't leave much slack to get the child in or out. Definitely will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Poor cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: So far doesn't seem like the greatest quality. It bends pretty easily and seems flimsy. The box was half open when it arrived and very obviously retaped. It also has scuff marks on the bottom that makes it look used. Over all I'm pretty disappointed in this Purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Derek C.

customer_reviews.title: Great seat, great features, fabulous price
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous seat! Well made, nice fabric and very cushy and comfy. Light weight and easy for grandparents to use and install. 9 month old was snug and very happy in this seat. Great seat for the money
customer_reviews.author: Mihran Jebejian

customer_reviews.title: Nice straightforward choice
customer_reviews.text: As another reviewer put it, sometimes al of the choices out there for things like car seats are just overwhelming. This is a great option that is simple and affordable and will keep your child safe. The color, size, and styling of this seat are very simple and stylish. The seat fits rear facing into our Honda Fit without causing us to have to put the passenger seat all the way forward, although I'm fairly positive it would be a tight squeeze for a front facing larger child (the car's fault, not necessarily the seat's). I really like how cushioned the seat is and how plain the styling is. This is a nice lighter seat for the money!
customer_reviews.author: redhed

customer_reviews.title: Nice car seat for the money!
customer_reviews.text: So far we really love this car seat! Budget friendly, installation was fairly easy and it fits well in my 08 chevy Malibu. Installing almost needs two people, I am a female and did it myself but if you had one to pull the straps tighter and one to push the car seat it would Make it much easier. The fabric almost feels as though it has memory foam underneath and my son seemed to be very comfortable in it! The only thing I'm not in love with is the the bottom part that you click the buckles into is pretty short so unbuckling can be kind of awkward at first. Otherwise we are happy with our purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: A great choice at a good price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice car seat. Much lighter weight than most, which is a bone to my often sore back. It is rather wide due to the cup/bottle holders, so it might not be the best choice if you are dealing with cramped quarters. The insert which makes this useful over a broad age/size/weight range is rather ingenious. This can save the purchase of a second product as your child goes from baby to toddler.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Horner

customer_reviews.title: good convertible car seat
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent car seat. I love that it has the capability to work for kids 5 to 50 lbs. It has two cup holders which is nice, and it can go both rear facing and front facing. This car seat is easy to put in and works well. It says it is approved for airplanes, but I don't know many parents who pay for a ticket for young kids, rather than put them on your lap. This car seat looks nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Light-weight, comfy, secure, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We were happy to upgrade my son from his first infant carseat to this one. It is so much lighter, easily being lifted in and out of the car and installed in less than 5 minutes by my wife. The seat offers what appears to be good lateral support. My son (18 months) absolutely LOVES his own cup holders. My only complaint is that it is pretty wide, encroaching on the space of the person sitting next to this seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob and Kiki Hantla

customer_reviews.title: Would not fit in our big truck
customer_reviews.text: We had no trouble installing it. And we were glad to see it won't be hard to switch from back-facing to front-facing, when the time comes. The design allows the switch without complicated adjustments. But we had problems. Facing backwards the seat would not fit in our truck, which has a spacious back seat. The baby's feet were jammed up against the back of the truck seat, even though we tried to move the driver's seat foward to make room for it. The baby was uncomfortable, and so was the driver. Maybe this would work better in another vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Patto

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: While there are much better (and more expensive) convertible car seats on the market, this one is definitely budget friendly, lightweight, and much more padding than expected. It does have two cupholders (one on each side) which is more than most others. It is simple, uncomplicated, and easy to use, easy to get it and out. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. Manning

customer_reviews.title: It was easy enough for my wife to install and our daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this carseat on Prime Day for our toddler to use when she is with her grandparents. It was easy enough for my wife to install and our daughter appears to be comfortable in it. It doesn't take up any more space than her infant seat did. The instructions that accompanied the seat were clear and straightforward. We installed it using the seatbelt path as the Latch hook method didn't produce as secure of a fit as we would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Nice car seat but width may be an issue.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but too big for a smaller sedan. At least width wise, we aren't able to fit it next to two booster seats. It does seem more expensive (north of $100) than models with more cushioning. Wouldn't recommend if you have limited room other wise a nice choice if the price falls below $100. No problems installing, standard design with anchor straps etc. would rather have less width than the two useless cup holders.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Works for us
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be easy to install. My 2 year old is on the small side - he weighs just under 22 pounds. He was able to wiggle out of the shoulder straps on our ither car seat, but this one adjusts enough to kerp him contained.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Ester

customer_reviews.title: Very Light
customer_reviews.text: This car seat looks good and is very light. Perfect for travel where you might want to move it from car to car or airplane. It looks high quality and is east to install in your car. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Book Fanatic

product_meta.title: Cosco Comfy Convertible Car Seat, Heather Amethyst
product_meta.description:
Color:Heather AmethystGet smart and give your child an extra-comfortable ride that keeps them safer in the car, from 5-50 pounds. The Comfy Convertible Car Seat keeps babies cozy and snug in the rear-facing position up to 40 pounds. In forward-facing mode, it gives kids a comfy and secure ride to 50 pounds.

In both modes, the Comfy Convertible Car Seat keeps kids safer with Side Impact Protection built right in, and a 5-point harness that adjusts easily from the front of the seat. The harness features 5 heights and 3 buckle locations so you can be sure you’re giving the best fit to your growing child.

Kids will love the extra padding that’s covered in a super comfy fabric for a ride that lets them rest easy. You'll love that the fabric is designed to last and is both machine washable and dryer safe.

If your chosen vehicle happens to be an airplane, the Comfy Convertible has got you covered. Certified for use on aircraft, it gives your child a familiar seat during the flight.

The Comfy Convertible is proudly made by Cosco in Columbus, Indiana. Made by American families for American families.
feature_bullets: An extra-comfortable ride that lasts for years: Rear-facing 5-40 pounds and Forward-facing 22-50 pounds
An extra-comfortable ride that lasts for years: Rear-facing 5-40 pounds and Forward-facing 22-50 pounds
Premium fabrics Flexible pillows for a comfortable and snug fit, remove when not needed Machine washable and dryer safe seat pad LATCH equipped Airplane ready Exceeds Federal Safety Standards

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars19 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
